REST API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Create a new contact in the database and return the new contact.

Parameters:

  • body (ContactSchema) – Contact data

  • db (AsyncSession) – SQLAlchemy database session

  • user (User) – Current user

Returns:

Newly created contact

Return type:

Contact

async src.repository.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Delete a contact from the database by contact id.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact to delete

  • db (AsyncSession) – SQLAlchemy database session

  • user (User) – Current user

Returns:

Deleted contact if found, otherwise None

Return type:

Optional[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(name: str, surname: str, email: str, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Get a contact from the database and return the contact.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the contact

  • surname (str) – Surname of the contact

  • email (str) – Email of the contact

  • db (AsyncSession) – SQLAlchemy database session

  • user (User) – User to get the contact

Returns:

Contact if found, otherwise None

Return type:

Optional[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts(limit: int, offset: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Get all contacts for a given contact schema.

Parameters:

  • limit (int) – Limit of contacts to return

  • offset (int) – Offset for pagination

  • db (AsyncSession) – SQLAlchemy database session

  • user (User) – Current user

Returns:

a list of contacts

Return type:

list[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.get_upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Get all contacts with upcoming birthdays for the current week.

Parameters:

  • db (AsyncSession) – SQLAlchemy database session

  • user (User) – Current user

Returns:

list of upcoming birthdays

Return type:

list[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdateSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Update contact information for a contact with a given contact id.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact to update

  • body (ContactUpdateSchema) – Contact update schema

  • db (AsyncSession) – SQLAlchemy database session

  • user (User) – current user

Returns:

updated contact information

Return type:

Optional[Contact]

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session

async src.repository.users.get_user_by_email(email: str, db: AsyncSession)¶

Get a user by email from the database.

Parameters:

  • email (str) – The email

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session

Returns:

User object if found, None otherwise :rtype: User | None

async src.repository.users.update_avatar(email, url: str, db: AsyncSession) → User¶

Update user’s avatar.

Parameters:

  • email (str) – users email

  • url (str) – The avatar URL

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session

Returns:

The updated user

Return type:

User

async src.repository.users.update_token(user: User, token: str | None, db: AsyncSession)¶

Update user’s refresh token.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – The user

  • token (str | None) – The refresh token

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session

REST API routes Auth¶

async src.routes.auth.confirmed_email(token: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Confirm the user’s email address and password from the database.

Parameters:

  • token (str) – email verification token

  • db (AsyncSession) – database connection

Returns:

confirmation message

Return type:

str

async src.routes.auth.login(body: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(NoneType), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Login the user with the specified password.

Parameters:

  • body (OAuth2PasswordRequestForm) – user credentials

  • db (AsyncSession) – database

Returns:

access token and refresh token

Return type:

TokenSchema

async src.routes.auth.refresh_token(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Security(HTTPBearer), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Refresh token for the given credentials and database connection.

Parameters:

  • credentials (HTTPAuthorizationCredentials) – The credentials to refresh the token for the given credentials

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database connection

Returns:

The new access and refresh tokens

Return type:

HTTPAuthorizationCredentials

async src.routes.auth.request_email(body: RequestEmail, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Send a confirmation email to the user’s email address from the database.

Parameters:

  • body (RequestEmail) – user email address

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – background tasks for sending emails

  • request (Request) – request

  • db (AsyncSession) – database connection

Returns:

confirmation message

Return type:

str

async src.routes.auth.signup(body: UserSchema, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Signup a user to the application and add it to the database.

Parameters:

  • body (UserSchema) – user information

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – background tasks for sending emails

  • request (Request) – request

  • db (AsyncSession) – database

Returns:

new user

Return type:

UserResponse

REST API routes Contacts¶

async src.routes.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactSchema, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Create a new contact.

Parameters:

  • body (ContactSchema) – Contact data

  • db (AsyncSession) – database connection

  • user (User) – current authenticated user

Returns:

Created contact

Return type:

ContactResponse

async src.routes.contacts.delete_contact(name: str = Query(None), surname: str = Query(None), email: str = Query(None), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Delete contact by name, surname or email.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the contact

  • surname (str) – Surname of the contact

  • email (str) – Email of the contact

  • db (AsyncSession) – database connection

  • user (User) – current authenticated user

async src.routes.contacts.get_contacts(limit: int = Query(10), offset: int = Query(0), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Get contacts for a given user.

Parameters:

  • limit (int) – Limit of contacts to return

  • offset (int) – Offset of contacts to skip

  • db (AsyncSession) – database connection

  • user (User) – current authenticated user

Returns:

List of contacts for the user

Return type:

List[ContactResponse]

async src.routes.contacts.get_upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Parameters:

  • db (AsyncSession) – database connection

  • user (User) – current authenticated user

Returns:

List of contacts with upcoming birthdays

Return type:

List[ContactResponse]

async src.routes.contacts.search_contact(name: str = Query(None), surname: str = Query(None), email: str = Query(None), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Search for a contact by name, surname or email.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the contact

  • surname (str) – Surname of the contact

  • email (str) – Email of the contact

  • db (AsyncSession) – database connection

  • user (User) – current authenticated user

Returns:

Contact matching the search criteria

Return type:

ContactResponse

async src.routes.contacts.update_contact(body: ContactUpdateSchema, name: str = Query(None), surname: str = Query(None), email: str = Query(None), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

  • email (str) – Email of the contact
